title: Huawei says will never sell smart devices business
content:
Photo taken on Jan. 28, 2020 shows a Huawei 5G mobile phone testing speed at the Huawei 5G Innovation and Experience Center in London, Britain. (Xinhua/Han Yan)
TAIYUAN, Feb. 9 (Xinhua) -- Chinese hi-tech giant Huawei's founder and CEO Ren Zhengfei said Tuesday that the company will never sell its smart devices business.
